fixes.name: Number of Complaints
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau COUNTD([Complaint ID]) to DAX DISTINCTCOUNT on 'complaints'[Complaint ID]. This is an aggregation, so it is implemented as a measure.

fixes.name: Product % Complaints
fixes.dax_expression: DIVIDE([Number of Complaints], CALCULATE([Number of Complaints], ALL('complaints')))
fixes.solution_explanation: Tableau TOTAL([Number of Complaints]) returns the grand total (table calculation). In DAX, replicate this by calculating the measure over ALL('complaints') to remove filters. Use DIVIDE to safely compute the percentage.
